BG3 Trickery Domain Tips & Builds

Trickery Domain is a unique subclass for the Cleric with different advantages. It offers utility in the form of Blessing of the Trickster which can provide advantage on stealth checks. Invoke Duplicity grants allies advantage on attacks against enemies within 3m of the illusion you placed.
